author: rsreds
body:
#### PR description:

Update FastTimerService to support the new json resource format in [circles](https://github.com/fwyzard/circles/commit/4ec61a8b6baf3e08748645940c75837a74c367c9)

The new format is like:
```
"resources": [
    {
      "description": "real time",
      "name": "time_real",
      "title": "Time",
      "unit": "ms"
    },
    ...
    ]
```

#### PR validation:

Tested with new version of circles and results in the same visualization

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

This PR is not a backport
title: Update FastTimerService to new resource format in circles
